title: PMS 2.0 707 - Feel Good Friday With Jordan Schultz, Josh Sitton, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, AJ Hawk fills in for Pat who joins the show later LIVE from Atlanta as he prepares for Friday Night Smackdown tonight in Atlanta, and his SummerSlam match tomorrow night against Bum Ass Corbin in Nashville. They chat about DK Metcalf's new deal, the Cardinals removing the film watching addendum in Kyler Murray's contract and why the damage has already been done, and the general feel of being in camp around this time. Joining the progrum to chat more in depth about DK Metcalf's extension, what he thinks this does for Deebo's upcoming new deal, if he see's the Seahawks trying to upgrade at Quarterback, and what he's hearing from various camps around the league is NFL and NBA Insider, Jordan Schultz (17:34-39:20). Later, Super Bowl Champion, 3x All-Pro, 4x Pro Bowler, 10 year NFL veteran on the offensive line, Josh Sitton joins the show from the golf course to chat about his thoughts on Kyler Murray's contract situation, why he'd go back and play for the Bucs in a heart beat, what he misses most about playing in the NFL, and more (1:38:35-1:52:34). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show, and listen on Sirius XM Channel 82, Mad Dog Radio. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
